== Regression bugs overview ==

The purpose of this review is to draw an overview of the state of the bug reports tagged with a regression-* tag. This is based on the data exported from LP on Aug. 21rst.

Only the tasks with an opened status  ( status: 'New', 'Incomplete', 'Confirmed', 'Triaged', 'In Progress', 'Fix Committed')  have been exported.

'''Nominated for''' means that a task as been opened against this release.

'''Reported in''' means that the report as been submitted with this release. Note that 5 reports reported with gutsy and intrepid are not shown in the tables above.

Only 1/4 of the tasks are targeted to a specific release. If we use the release associated with the report ( from the tags or the DistroRelease key from apport) the number of unidentified reports drops to 30%. 

The tasks with an unknown release are bug reports filed and tagged fully manually. 

This table shows that the regression-potential and regression-release need attention.

==== New/Incomplete reports on Stable Release (Need triage) ====

The tasks opened against a Stable Release and with a regression-* tag need to be promoted or demoted. If the task has been opened a while ago and we are not able to reproduce on the targeted stable release, then ask if it's still an issue for the reporter. It may have been fixed with a SRU or may be specific to the reporter's environment
